i have windows 7 x64, and have no problems with the skidrow 12.0.2 crack.  i would recommend anyone who doesn't like crash dumps to use this version until 12.0.4 is fixed.

only problem with 12.0.2 is the goalkeeper training bug which is a problem with the game and not with the crack.  it is also not very noticable.  i prefer that to not being able to compare staff or players.  that is very annoying to me.
